FairValueMeasurementWithUnobservableInpu.label: Fair Value, Measurement with Unobservable Inputs Reconciliation, Recurring Basis, Liability Value
FairValueMeasurementWithUnobservableInpu.description: Fair value of financial instrument classified as a liability measured using unobservable inputs that reflect the entity's own assumption about the assumptions market participants would use in pricing.

FairValueOptionAggregateDifferencesLoans.label: Fair Value, Option, Aggregate Differences, Loans and Long-term Receivables
FairValueOptionAggregateDifferencesLoans.description: This item represents the difference between the aggregate fair value and the aggregate unpaid principal balance of loans and long-term receivables (other than securities categorized as trading, available-for-sale or held-to-maturity) that have contractual principal amounts and for which the fair value option has been elected.

FairValueOptionChangesInFairValueGainLos.label: Fair Value, Option, Changes in Fair Value, Gain (Loss) (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
FairValueOptionChangesInFairValueGainLos.description: This item represents, for each line item in the statement of financial position, the amounts of gains and losses from fair value changes included in earnings during the period and in which line in the income statement those gains and losses are reported. This item may also include amounts of gains and losses for other items measured at fair value, but for which the fair value option has not been elected (for instance, items required to be measured at fair value).

FairValueOptionChangesInFairValueGainLos.label: Fair Value, Option, Changes in Fair Value, Gain (Loss)
FairValueOptionChangesInFairValueGainLos.description: For each line item in the statement of financial position, the amounts of gains and losses from fair value changes included in earnings.

FairValueOptionCreditRiskGainsLossesOnAs.label: Fair Value, Option, Credit Risk, Gains (Losses) on Assets
FairValueOptionCreditRiskGainsLossesOnAs.description: This item represents the estimated amount of gains or losses included in earnings during the period attributable to changes in instrument-specific credit risk arising from loans and other receivables held as assets.

FairValueOptionCreditRiskGainsLossesOnLi.label: Fair Value, Option, Credit Risk, Gains (Losses) on Liabilities (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
FairValueOptionCreditRiskGainsLossesOnLi.description: This item represents the estimated amount of gains and losses from fair value changes included in earnings that are attributable to changes in the instrument-specific credit risk of liabilities with fair values that have been significantly affected during the reporting period by changes in the instrument-specific credit risk.

FairValueOptionLoansHeldAsAssets90DaysOr.label: Fair Value, Option, Loans Held as Assets, 90 Days or More Past Due
FairValueOptionLoansHeldAsAssets90DaysOr.description: This item represents the aggregate fair value of loans held as assets that are 90 days or more past due for which the fair value option has been elected.

FeesAndCommissionsOther.label: Fees and Commissions, Other (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
FeesAndCommissionsOther.description: Amount of fee and commission revenue classified as other.

FinancingReceivableAcquiredWithDeteriora.label: Financing Receivable, Acquired with Deteriorated Credit Quality (Deprecated 2015-01-31)
FinancingReceivableAcquiredWithDeteriora.description: The balance of financing receivables that were acquired with deteriorated credit quality.

FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLos.label: Financing Receivable, Allowance for Credit Losses, Acquired with Deteriorated Credit Quality (Deprecated 2015-01-31)
FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLos.description: The valuation allowance for financing receivables acquired with deteriorated credit quality.

FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLos.label: Financing Receivable, Allowance for Credit Losses, Collectively Evaluated for Impairment
FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLos.description: The valuation allowance for financing receivables that are expected to be uncollectible that were collectively evaluated for impairment.

FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLos.label: Financing Receivable, Allowance for Credit Losses, Individually Evaluated for Impairment
FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLos.description: Amount of valuation allowance for financing receivables that are expected to be uncollectible that were individually evaluated for impairment.

FinancingReceivableCollectivelyEvaluated.label: Financing Receivable, Collectively Evaluated for Impairment
FinancingReceivableCollectivelyEvaluated.description: The balance of financing receivables that were collectively evaluated for impairment.

FinancingReceivableIndividuallyEvaluated.label: Financing Receivable, Individually Evaluated for Impairment
FinancingReceivableIndividuallyEvaluated.description: The balance of financing receivables that were individually evaluated for impairment.

FinancingReceivableRecordedInvestment30T.label: Financing Receivable, Recorded Investment, 30 to 59 Days Past Due (Deprecated 2015-01-31)
FinancingReceivableRecordedInvestment30T.description: Financing receivables that are less than 60 days past due but more than 29 days past due.

FinancingReceivableRecordedInvestment60T.label: Financing Receivable, Recorded Investment, 60 to 89 Days Past Due (Deprecated 2015-01-31)
FinancingReceivableRecordedInvestment60T.description: Financing receivables that are less than 90 days past due but more than 59 days past due.

FinancingReceivableRecordedInvestmentCur.label: Financing Receivable, Not Past Due
FinancingReceivableRecordedInvestmentCur.description: Amount of financing receivable not past due.

FinancingReceivableRecordedInvestmentEqu.label: Financing Receivable, Recorded Investment, Equal to Greater than 90 Days Past Due (Deprecated 2015-01-31)
FinancingReceivableRecordedInvestmentEqu.description: Financing receivables that are equal to or greater than 90 days past due.

FinancingReceivableRecordedInvestmentNon.label: Financing Receivable, Nonaccrual
FinancingReceivableRecordedInvestmentNon.description: Amount of financing receivable on nonaccrual status.

FinancingReceivableRecordedInvestmentPas.label: Financing Receivable, Past Due
FinancingReceivableRecordedInvestmentPas.description: Amount of financing receivable past due.

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAccumulatedAm.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Assets, Accumulated Amortization
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAccumulatedAm.description: Accumulated amount of amortization of assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with a finite life.

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Asset, Expected Amortization, after Year Five
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.description: Amount of amortization for asset, excluding financial asset and goodwill, lacking physical substance with finite life expected to be recognized after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Asset, Expected Amortization, Year One
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.description: Amount of amortization for assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with finite life expected to be recognized in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Asset, Expected Amortization, Remainder of Fiscal Year
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.description: Amount of amortization for assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with finite life expected to be recognized in remainder of current fiscal year.

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Asset, Expected Amortization, Year Five
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.description: Amount of amortization for assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with finite life expected to be recognized in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Asset, Expected Amortization, Year Four
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.description: Amount of amortization for assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with finite life expected to be recognized in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Asset, Expected Amortization, Year Three
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.description: Amount of amortization for assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with finite life expected to be recognized in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Asset, Expected Amortization, Year Two
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.description: Amount of amortization for assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with finite life expected to be recognized in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsGross.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Assets, Gross
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsGross.description: Amount before amortization of assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with a finite life.

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsNet.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Assets, Net
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsNet.description: Amount after amortization of assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with a finite life.

ForeclosedRealEstateExpense.label: Foreclosed Real Estate Expense
ForeclosedRealEstateExpense.description: Amount of expense recognized during the period for the foreclosure on real estate assets.

GainLossOnSaleOfBusiness.label: Gain (Loss) on Disposition of Business
GainLossOnSaleOfBusiness.description: Amount of gain (loss) from sale and disposal of integrated set of activities and assets capable of being conducted and managed for purpose of providing return in form of dividend, lower cost, or other economic benefit to investor, owner, member and participant.

GainLossOnSaleOfInvestments.label: Gain (Loss) on Sale of Investments
GainLossOnSaleOfInvestments.description: The net realized gain (loss) on investments sold during the period, not including gains (losses) on securities separately or otherwise categorized as trading, available-for-sale, or held-to-maturity, which, for cash flow reporting, is a component of proceeds from investing activities.

GainLossOnSaleOfMortgageLoans.label: Gain (Loss) on Sale of Mortgage Loans
GainLossOnSaleOfMortgageLoans.description: The gains (losses) included in earnings that represent the difference between the sale price and the carrying value of loans made to finance real estate acquisitions. This element refers to the gain (loss) and not to the cash proceeds of the sale. This element is a noncash adjustment to net income when calculating net cash generated by operating activities using the indirect method.

GainLossOnSalesOfLoansNet.label: Gain (Loss) on Sales of Loans, Net
GainLossOnSalesOfLoansNet.description: The net gain (loss) resulting from a sale of loans, including adjustments to record loans classified as held-for-sale at the lower-of-cost-or-market and fair value adjustments to loan held for investment purposes.

GainOrLossOnSaleOfStockInSubsidiary.label: Gain (Loss) on Disposition of Stock in Subsidiary
GainOrLossOnSaleOfStockInSubsidiary.description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of equity in securities of subsidiaries.

GainsLossesOnExtinguishmentOfDebt.label: Gain (Loss) on Extinguishment of Debt
GainsLossesOnExtinguishmentOfDebt.description: Difference between the fair value of payments made and the carrying amount of debt which is extinguished prior to maturity.

GainsLossesOnSalesOfOtherRealEstate.label: Gains (Losses) on Sales of Other Real Estate
GainsLossesOnSalesOfOtherRealEstate.description: The net gain (loss) resulting from sales and other disposals of other real estate owned, increases (decreases) in the valuation allowance for foreclosed real estate, and write-downs of other real estate owned after acquisition or physical possession.

GeneralAndAdministrativeExpense.label: General and Administrative Expense
GeneralAndAdministrativeExpense.description: The aggregate total of expenses of managing and administering the affairs of an entity, including affiliates of the reporting entity, which are not directly or indirectly associated with the manufacture, sale or creation of a product or product line.

Goodwill.label: Goodwill
Goodwill.description: Amount after accumulated impairment loss of an asset representing future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized.

GoodwillAcquiredDuringPeriod.label: Goodwill, Acquired During Period
GoodwillAcquiredDuringPeriod.description: Amount of increase in asset representing future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized resulting from a business combination.

GoodwillAndIntangibleAssetImpairment.label: Goodwill and Intangible Asset Impairment
GoodwillAndIntangibleAssetImpairment.description: Total loss recognized during the period from the impairment of goodwill plus the loss recognized in the period resulting from the impairment of the carrying amount of intangible assets, other than goodwill.

GoodwillGross.label: Goodwill, Gross
GoodwillGross.description: Amount before accumulated impairment loss of an asset representing future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized.

GoodwillImpairedAccumulatedImpairmentLos.label: Goodwill, Impaired, Accumulated Impairment Loss
GoodwillImpairedAccumulatedImpairmentLos.description: Amount of accumulated impairment loss for an asset representing future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized.

GoodwillImpairmentLoss.label: Goodwill, Impairment Loss
GoodwillImpairmentLoss.description: Amount of loss from the write-down of an asset representing the future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized.

GoodwillOtherChanges.label: Goodwill, Other Changes (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
GoodwillOtherChanges.description: Amount of other (increase) decrease of an asset representing the future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized.

GoodwillPurchaseAccountingAdjustments.label: Goodwill, Purchase Accounting Adjustments
GoodwillPurchaseAccountingAdjustments.description: Amount of increase (decrease) from adjustments after acquisition date under purchase accounting of an asset representing the future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized.

GoodwillWrittenOffRelatedToSaleOfBusines.label: Goodwill, Written off Related to Sale of Business Unit
GoodwillWrittenOffRelatedToSaleOfBusines.description: Amount of divestiture of an asset representing future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized.

ImpactOfRestatementOnEarningsPerShareBas.label: Impact of Restatement on Earnings Per Share, Basic (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
ImpactOfRestatementOnEarningsPerShareBas.description: Per share amount effect of a restatement of results of operations on basic earnings per share.

ImpactOfRestatementOnEarningsPerShareDil.label: Impact of Restatement on Earnings Per Share, Diluted (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
ImpactOfRestatementOnEarningsPerShareDil.description: Per share amount effect of a restatement of results of operations on diluted earnings per share.

IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsBefore.label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations before Income Taxes, Noncontrolling Interest
IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsBefore.description: Amount of income (loss) from continuing operations, including income (loss) from equity method investments, before deduction of income tax expense (benefit), and income (loss) attributable to noncontrolling interest.

IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsBefore.label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations before Equity Method Investments, Income Taxes, Noncontrolling Interest
IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsBefore.description: Amount of income (loss) from continuing operations before deduction of income tax expense (benefit) and income (loss) attributable to noncontrolling interest, and addition of income (loss) from equity method investments.

IncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.label: Income Tax Expense (Benefit)
IncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.description: Amount of current income tax expense (benefit) and deferred income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to continuing operations.

IncomeTaxesPaid.label: Income Taxes Paid
IncomeTaxesPaid.description: The amount of cash paid during the current period to foreign, federal, state, and local authorities as taxes on income.

IncomeTaxesPaidNet.label: Income Taxes Paid, Net
IncomeTaxesPaidNet.description: The amount of cash paid during the current period to foreign, federal, state, and local authorities as taxes on income, net of any cash received during the current period as refunds for the overpayment of taxes.

IncomeTaxReceivable.label: Income Taxes Receivable
IncomeTaxReceivable.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of income taxes previously overpaid to tax authorities (such as U.S. Federal, state and local tax authorities) representing refunds of overpayments or recoveries based on agreed-upon resolutions of disputes. Also called income tax refund receivable.

IncomeTaxReconciliationChangeInDeferredT.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Change in Deferred Tax Assets Valuation Allowance, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationChangeInDeferredT.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to increase (decrease) in the valuation allowance for deferred tax assets.

IncomeTaxReconciliationChangeInEnactedTa.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Change in Enacted Tax Rate, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationChangeInEnactedTa.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations, attributable to increase (decrease) in the income tax rates.

IncomeTaxReconciliationIncomeTaxExpenseB.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation at Federal Statutory Income Tax Rate, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationIncomeTaxExpenseB.description: The amount of income tax expense or benefit for the period computed by applying the domestic federal statutory tax rates to pretax income from continuing operations.

IncomeTaxReconciliationNondeductibleExpe.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Nondeductible Expense, Impairment Losses, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationNondeductibleExpe.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to nondeductible impairment loss.

IncomeTaxReconciliationNondeductibleExpe.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Nondeductible Expense, Share-based Payment Arrangement, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationNondeductibleExpe.description: Amount of reported income tax expense (benefit) in excess of (less than) expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying domestic federal statutory income tax rate to pretax income (loss) from continuing operation, attributable to nondeductible expense for award under share-based payment arrangement. Includes, but is not limited to, expense determined to be nondeductible upon grant or after for award under share-based payment arrangement.

IncomeTaxReconciliationOtherAdjustments.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Other Adjustments, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationOtherAdjustments.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to other adjustments.

IncomeTaxReconciliationStateAndLocalInco.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, State and Local Income Taxes, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationStateAndLocalInco.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to state and local income tax expense (benefit).

IncreaseDecreaseDueFromAffiliates.label: Increase (Decrease) Due from Affiliates
IncreaseDecreaseDueFromAffiliates.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in receivables to be collected from an entity that is controlling, under the control of, or within the same control group as the reporting entity by means of direct or indirect ownership.

IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsAndOtherReceiv.label: Increase (Decrease) in Accounts and Other Receivables
IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsAndOtherReceiv.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amount due from customers for the credit sale of goods and services; includes accounts receivable and other types of receivables.

IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsPayableAndAccr.label: Increase (Decrease) in Accounts Payable and Accrued Liabilities
IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsPayableAndAccr.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amounts payable to vendors for goods and services received and the amount of obligations and expenses incurred but not paid.

IncreaseDecreaseInDueToAffiliates.label: Increase (Decrease) in Due to Affiliates
IncreaseDecreaseInDueToAffiliates.description: The increase (decrease) in obligations owed to an entity that is controlling, under the control of, or within the same control group as the reporting entity by means of direct or indirect ownership.

IncreaseDecreaseInInterestPayableNet.label: Increase (Decrease) in Interest Payable, Net
IncreaseDecreaseInInterestPayableNet.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in interest payable, which represents the amount owed to note holders, bond holders, and other parties for interest earned on loans or credit extended to the reporting entity.

IncreaseDecreaseInMortgageLoansHeldForSa.label: Increase (Decrease) in Mortgage Loans Held-for-sale
IncreaseDecreaseInMortgageLoansHeldForSa.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the value of mortgage loans that are held with the intention to sell or be securitized in the near future.

IncreaseDecreaseInOtherAccountsPayableAn.label: Increase (Decrease) in Other Accounts Payable and Accrued Liabilities
IncreaseDecreaseInOtherAccountsPayableAn.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in other obligations or expenses incurred but not yet paid.

IncreaseDecreaseInOtherOperatingAssets.label: Increase (Decrease) in Other Operating Assets
IncreaseDecreaseInOtherOperatingAssets.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in operating assets classified as other.

IncreaseDecreaseInRestrictedCash.label: Increase (Decrease) in Restricted Cash
IncreaseDecreaseInRestrictedCash.description: The net cash inflow or outflow for the increase (decrease) associated with funds that are not available for withdrawal or use (such as funds held in escrow) and are associated with underlying transactions that are classified as investing activities.

IncrementalCommonSharesAttributableToSha.label: Incremental Common Shares Attributable to Dilutive Effect of Share-based Payment Arrangements
IncrementalCommonSharesAttributableToSha.description: Additional shares included in the calculation of diluted EPS as a result of the potentially dilutive effect of share based payment arrangements using the treasury stock method.

InsuranceServicesRevenue.label: Insurance Services Revenue
InsuranceServicesRevenue.description: Revenue from insurance services, including net premiums earned, gain on sale of insurance block, agency management fees and insurance contract fees and commissions.

IntangibleAssetsGrossExcludingGoodwill.label: Intangible Assets, Gross (Excluding Goodwill)
IntangibleAssetsGrossExcludingGoodwill.description: Amount before accumulated amortization of intangible assets, excluding goodwill.

IntangibleAssetsNetExcludingGoodwill.label: Intangible Assets, Net (Excluding Goodwill)
IntangibleAssetsNetExcludingGoodwill.description: Sum of the carrying amounts of all intangible assets, excluding goodwill, as of the balance sheet date, net of accumulated amortization and impairment charges.

InterestAndFeeIncomeLoansAndLeases.label: Interest and Fee Income, Loans and Leases
InterestAndFeeIncomeLoansAndLeases.description: The aggregate interest and fee income generated by: (1) loans the Entity has positive intent and ability to hold for the foreseeable future, or until maturity or payoff, including commercial and consumer loans, whether domestic or foreign, which may consist of: (a) industrial and agricultural; (b) real estate; and (c) real estate construction loans; (d) trade financing; (e) lease financing; (f) home equity lines-of-credit; (g) automobile and other vehicle loans; and (h) credit card and other revolving-type loans and (2) loans and leases held-for-sale which may include mortgage loans, direct financing, and sales-type leases.

InterestAndFeeIncomeLoansAndLeasesHeldFo.label: Interest and Fee Income, Loans and Leases Held-for-sale
InterestAndFeeIncomeLoansAndLeasesHeldFo.description: The amount of interest and fee income earned from loans held-for-sale, including mortgage loans, and interest earned from direct financing and sales-type leases held-for-sale.

InterestAndFeeIncomeLoansHeldForSaleMort.label: Interest and Fee Income, Loans Held-for-sale, Mortgages
InterestAndFeeIncomeLoansHeldForSaleMort.description: Interest and fee income from mortgage loans considered to be held-for-sale.

InterestExpense.label: Interest Expense
InterestExpense.description: Amount of the cost of borrowed funds accounted for as interest expense.

InterestExpenseDebt.label: Interest Expense, Debt
InterestExpenseDebt.description: Amount of the cost of borrowed funds accounted for as interest expense for debt.

InterestExpenseOther.label: Interest Expense, Other
InterestExpenseOther.description: Amount of interest expense classified as other.

InterestIncomeExpenseAfterProvisionForLo.label: Interest Income (Expense), after Provision for Loan Loss
InterestIncomeExpenseAfterProvisionForLo.description: Amount of interest income or expense, including any amortization and accretion (as applicable) of discounts and premiums, including consideration of the provisions for loan, lease, credit, and other related losses.

InterestIncomeExpenseNet.label: Interest Income (Expense), Net
InterestIncomeExpenseNet.description: The net amount of operating interest income (expense).

InterestPaid.label: Interest Paid, Including Capitalized Interest, Operating and Investing Activities
InterestPaid.description: Amount of cash paid for interest, including, but not limited to, capitalized interest and payment to settle zero-coupon bond attributable to accreted interest of debt discount and debt instrument with insignificant coupon interest rate in relation to effective interest rate of borrowing attributable to accreted interest of debt discount; classified as operating and investing activities.

InterestPaidNet.label: Interest Paid, Excluding Capitalized Interest, Operating Activities
InterestPaidNet.description: Amount of cash paid for interest, excluding capitalized interest, classified as operating activity. Includes, but is not limited to, payment to settle zero-coupon bond for accreted interest of debt discount and debt instrument with insignificant coupon interest rate in relation to effective interest rate of borrowing attributable to accreted interest of debt discount.

InterestPayableCurrentAndNoncurrent.label: Interest Payable
InterestPayableCurrentAndNoncurrent.description: Amount of interest payable on debt, including, but not limited to, trade payables.

InterestReceivable.label: Interest Receivable
InterestReceivable.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of interest earned but not received. Also called accrued interest or accrued interest receivable.

LaborAndRelatedExpense.label: Labor and Related Expense
LaborAndRelatedExpense.description: Amount of expense for salary, wage, profit sharing; incentive and equity-based compensation; and other employee benefit.

LateFeeIncomeGeneratedByServicingFinanci.label: Late Fee Income Generated by Servicing Financial Assets, Amount
LateFeeIncomeGeneratedByServicingFinanci.description: All amounts that are due to the servicer of a financial asset as a result of the debt holder not meeting the monthly payment terms.

LeaseAndRentalExpense.label: Operating Leases, Rent Expense
LeaseAndRentalExpense.description: Amount of rent expense incurred for leased assets, including but not limited to, furniture and equipment, that is not directly or indirectly associated with the manufacture, sale or creation of a product or product line.

LegalFees.label: Legal Fees
LegalFees.description: The amount of expense provided in the period for legal costs incurred on or before the balance sheet date pertaining to resolved, pending or threatened litigation, including arbitration and mediation proceedings.

Liabilities.label: Liabilities
Liabilities.description: Sum of the carrying amounts as of the balance sheet date of all liabilities that are recognized. Liabilities are probable future sacrifices of economic benefits arising from present obligations of an entity to transfer assets or provide services to other entities in the future.

LiabilitiesAndStockholdersEquity.label: Liabilities and Equity
LiabilitiesAndStockholdersEquity.description: Amount of liabilities and equity items, including the portion of equity attributable to noncontrolling interests, if any.

LiabilitiesFairValueDisclosure.label: Financial and Nonfinancial Liabilities, Fair Value Disclosure
LiabilitiesFairValueDisclosure.description: Fair value of financial and nonfinancial obligations.

LiabilitiesOfDisposalGroupIncludingDisco.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Liabilities
LiabilitiesOfDisposalGroupIncludingDisco.description: Amount classified as liabilities attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of.

LiabilitiesSubjectToCompromise.label: Liabilities Subject to Compromise
LiabilitiesSubjectToCompromise.description: Total amount of liabilities subject to compromise.

LiabilitiesSubjectToCompromiseAccountsPa.label: Liabilities Subject to Compromise, Accounts Payable and Accrued Liabilities
LiabilitiesSubjectToCompromiseAccountsPa.description: The amount of trade accounts payable included in liabilities subject to compromise.

LiabilitiesSubjectToCompromiseDebtAndAcc.label: Liabilities Subject to Compromise, Debt and Accrued Interest
LiabilitiesSubjectToCompromiseDebtAndAcc.description: The amount of debt and related accrued interest included in liabilities subject to compromise.

LiabilityForUncertainTaxPositionsNoncurr.label: Liability for Uncertainty in Income Taxes, Noncurrent
LiabilityForUncertainTaxPositionsNoncurr.description: Amount recognized for uncertainty in income taxes classified as noncurrent.

LiabilityForUnpaidClaimsAndClaimsAdjustm.label: Liability for Unpaid Claims and Claims Adjustment Expense, Gross (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
LiabilityForUnpaidClaimsAndClaimsAdjustm.description: The estimated cost of settling claims under the terms of the underlying insurance policies and assumed and ceded insurance contracts as of the balance sheet date, including an estimate for claims which have been incurred but not reported and the actual and estimated costs of settling claims.

LiabilityForUnpaidClaimsAndClaimsAdjustm.label: Liability for Unpaid Claims and Claims Adjustment Expense, Incurred Claims (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
LiabilityForUnpaidClaimsAndClaimsAdjustm.description: Total provision in the period for claims incurred and costs incurred in the claim settlement process.

LineOfCreditFacilityAmountOutstanding.label: Line of Credit Facility, Amount Outstanding (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
LineOfCreditFacilityAmountOutstanding.description: Amount borrowed under the credit facility as of the balance sheet date.

LineOfCreditFacilityDecreaseRepayments.label: Line of Credit Facility, Decrease, Repayments (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
LineOfCreditFacilityDecreaseRepayments.description: Decrease for amounts repaid on the credit facility for the period.

LitigationSettlementAmountAwardedToOther.label: Litigation Settlement, Amount Awarded to Other Party
LitigationSettlementAmountAwardedToOther.description: Amount awarded to other party in judgment or settlement of litigation.

LoansAndLeasesReceivableAllowance.label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Allowance
LoansAndLeasesReceivableAllowance.description: Amount of allowance to cover probable credit losses on loans and leases. Includes carryover of or adjustments to the allowance for loan losses in connection with business combinations. Excludes allowance for loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements.

LoansAndLeasesReceivableDeferredIncome.label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Deferred Income
LoansAndLeasesReceivableDeferredIncome.description: Amount of deferred interest and fee income, unamortized costs incurred to originate loans and leases, unamortized loan commitments and loan syndication fees, and premiums over or discounts from face amounts of acquired loans. Excludes amounts for loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements.

LoansAndLeasesReceivableGrossCarryingAmo.label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Gross
LoansAndLeasesReceivableGrossCarryingAmo.description: Amount before allowance of loans and leases held in portfolio, including but not limited to, commercial and consumer loans. Includes deferred interest and fees, undisbursed portion of loan balance, unamortized costs and premiums and discounts from face amounts. Excludes loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements.

LoansAndLeasesReceivableNetOfDeferredInc.label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Net of Deferred Income
LoansAndLeasesReceivableNetOfDeferredInc.description: Amount before allowance and after deduction of deferred interest and fees, unamortized costs and premiums and discounts from face amounts, of loans and leases held in portfolio, including but not limited to, commercial and consumer loans. Excludes loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements.

LoansAndLeasesReceivableNetReportedAmoun.label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Net Amount
LoansAndLeasesReceivableNetReportedAmoun.description: Amount after allowance and deduction of deferred interest and fees, unamortized costs and premiums and discounts from face amounts, of loans and leases held in portfolio, including but not limited to, commercial and consumer loans. Excludes loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements and loans held for sale.

LoansPledgedAsCollateral.label: Loans Pledged as Collateral
LoansPledgedAsCollateral.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of loans that have been pledged as collateral for borrowings. If the secured party has the right by contract or custom to sell or re-pledge the collateral, then the debtor reclassifies that asset and report that asset in its statement of financial position separately from other assets not so encumbered.

LoansReceivableFairValueDisclosure.label: Loans Receivable, Fair Value Disclosure
LoansReceivableFairValueDisclosure.description: Fair value portion of loan receivable, including, but not limited to, mortgage loans held for investment, finance receivables held for investment, policy loans on insurance contracts.

LoansReceivableHeldForSaleAmount.label: Financing Receivable, Held-for-Sale
LoansReceivableHeldForSaleAmount.description: Amount, before valuation allowance, of financing receivable classified as held-for-sale.

LoansReceivableHeldForSaleNet.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Loans Receivable, Net (Deprecated 2015-01-31)
LoansReceivableHeldForSaleNet.description: Amount classified as loans attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of. Excludes loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements and loans classified as debt securities.

LoansReceivableHeldForSaleReconciliation.label: Loans Receivable Held-for-sale, Reconciliation to Cash Flow, Additions to Held-for-sale
LoansReceivableHeldForSaleReconciliation.description: Amount, after allowance for bad debt, of additions to loan receivables held-for-sale that are not part of a disposal group.

LoansReceivableNet.label: Loans Receivable, Net (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
LoansReceivableNet.description: Amount after allowance and deduction of deferred interest and fees, unamortized costs and premiums and discounts from face amounts, of loans and leases held in portfolio, including but not limited to, commercial and consumer loans. Includes loans held for sale. Excludes loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements.

LongTermDebt.label: Long-term Debt
LongTermDebt.description: Amount, after unamortized (discount) premium and debt issuance costs, of long-term debt. Includes, but not limited to, notes payable, bonds payable, debentures, mortgage loans and commercial paper. Excludes capital lease obligations.

LongTermDebtAndCapitalLeaseObligations.label: Long-term Debt and Lease Obligation
LongTermDebtAndCapitalLeaseObligations.description: Amount of long-term debt and lease obligation, classified as noncurrent.

LongTermDebtFairValue.label: Long-term Debt, Fair Value
LongTermDebtFairValue.description: The fair value amount of long-term debt whether such amount is presented as a separate caption or as a parenthetical disclosure. Additionally, this element may be used in connection with the fair value disclosures required in the footnote disclosures to the financial statements. The element may be used in both the balance sheet and disclosure in the same submission.

LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.label: Long-Term Debt, Maturity, after Year Five
LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.description: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirement, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable price and date, maturing after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.label: Long-Term Debt, Maturity, Year One
LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.description: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirement, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable price and date, maturing in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.label: Long-Term Debt, Maturity, Year Five
LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.description: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirement, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable price and date, maturing in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.label: Long-Term Debt, Maturity, Year Four
LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.description: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirement, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable price and date, maturing in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.label: Long-Term Debt, Maturity, Year Three
LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.description: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirement, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable price and date, maturing in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.label: Long-Term Debt, Maturity, Year Two
LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.description: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirement, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable price and date, maturing in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LossContingencyLossInPeriod.label: Loss Contingency, Loss in Period
LossContingencyLossInPeriod.description: The amount of loss pertaining to the specified contingency that was charged against earnings in the period, including the effects of revisions in previously reported estimates.

LossesGainsOnSalesOfAssetsAndAssetImpair.label: Losses (Gains) on Sales of Assets and Asset Impairment Charges (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
LossesGainsOnSalesOfAssetsAndAssetImpair.description: The aggregate impact on earnings in the period of (a) the loss (gain) from the difference between the sale price or salvage price and the book value of an asset that was sold or retired during the reporting period, and (b) the charge against earnings resulting from the aggregate write down of all assets from their carrying value to their fair value.

MinorityInterestOwnershipPercentageByNon.label: Noncontrolling Interest, Ownership Percentage by Noncontrolling Owners
MinorityInterestOwnershipPercentageByNon.description: The equity interest of noncontrolling shareholders, partners or other equity holders in consolidated entity.

MortgageLoanRelatedToPropertySales1.label: Mortgage Loan Related to Property Sales
MortgageLoanRelatedToPropertySales1.description: Mortgage loan related to property sales in noncash investing and financing activities.

MortgageLoansInProcessOfForeclosureAmoun.label: Mortgage Loans in Process of Foreclosure, Amount
MortgageLoansInProcessOfForeclosureAmoun.description: Recorded investment of consumer mortgage loan receivables secured by residential real estate properties for which formal foreclosure proceedings are in process.

MortgageServicingRightsMSRImpairmentReco.label: Mortgage Servicing Rights (MSR) Impairment (Recovery)
MortgageServicingRightsMSRImpairmentReco.description: The adjustment to the carrying value of the rights retained or purchased to service mortgages. These adjustments are made when the estimate of the fair value is changed. This element is a noncash adjustment to net income when calculating net cash generated by operating activities using the indirect method.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInFinancingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Financing Activities
NetCashProvidedByUsedInFinancingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from financing activities, including discontinued operations. Financing activity cash flows include obtaining resources from owners and providing them with a return on, and a return of, their investment; borrowing money and repaying amounts borrowed, or settling the obligation; and obtaining and paying for other resources obtained from creditors on long-term credit.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInFinancingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Financing Activities, Continuing Operations
NetCashProvidedByUsedInFinancingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) of financing activities, excluding discontinued operations. Financing activity cash flows include obtaining resources from owners and providing them with a return on, and a return of, their investment; borrowing money and repaying amounts borrowed, or settling the obligation; and obtaining and paying for other resources obtained from creditors on long-term credit.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInInvestingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Investing Activities
NetCashProvidedByUsedInInvestingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from investing activities, including discontinued operations. Investing activity cash flows include making and collecting loans and acquiring and disposing of debt or equity instruments and property, plant, and equipment and other productive assets.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInInvestingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Investing Activities, Continuing Operations
NetCashProvidedByUsedInInvestingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) of investing activities, excluding discontinued operations. Investing activity cash flows include making and collecting loans and acquiring and disposing of debt or equity instruments and property, plant, and equipment and other productive assets.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Operating Activities
NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from operating activities, including discontinued operations. Operating activity cash flows include transactions, adjustments, and changes in value not defined as investing or financing activities.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Operating Activities, Continuing Operations
NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from operating activities, excluding discontinued operations. Operating activity cash flows include transactions, adjustments, and changes in value not defined as investing or financing activities.

NetIncomeLoss.label: Net Income (Loss) Attributable to Parent
NetIncomeLoss.description: The portion of profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, which is attributable to the parent.

NetIncomeLossAvailableToCommonStockholde.label: Net Income (Loss) Available to Common Stockholders, Basic
NetIncomeLossAvailableToCommonStockholde.description: Amount, after deduction of tax, noncontrolling interests, dividends on preferred stock and participating securities; of income (loss) available to common shareholders.

NetIncomeLossAvailableToCommonStockholde.label: Net Income (Loss) Available to Common Stockholders, Diluted
NetIncomeLossAvailableToCommonStockholde.description: Amount, after deduction of tax, noncontrolling interests, dividends on preferred stock and participating securities, and addition from assumption of issuance of common shares for dilutive potential common shares; of income (loss) available to common shareholders.

NoncashOrPartNoncashAcquisitionInvestmen.label: Noncash or Part Noncash Acquisition, Investments Acquired
NoncashOrPartNoncashAcquisitionInvestmen.description: "The amount of investments that an Entity acquires in a noncash (or part noncash) acquisition. Noncash is defined as information about all investing and financing activities of an enterprise during a period that affect recognized assets or liabilities but that do not result in cash receipts or cash payments in the period. ""Part noncash"" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period."

NoncashOrPartNoncashDivestitureAmountOfC.label: Noncash or Part Noncash Divestiture, Amount of Consideration Received
NoncashOrPartNoncashDivestitureAmountOfC.description: Amount of noncash consideration received for selling an asset or business through a noncash (or part noncash) transaction.

NoninterestExpense.label: Noninterest Expense
NoninterestExpense.description: Total aggregate amount of all noninterest expense.

NoninterestIncome.label: Noninterest Income
NoninterestIncome.description: The total amount of noninterest income which may be derived from: (1) fees and commissions; (2) premiums earned; (3) insurance policy charges; (4) the sale or disposal of assets; and (5) other sources not otherwise specified.

NoninterestIncomeOtherOperatingIncome.label: Noninterest Income, Other Operating Income
NoninterestIncomeOtherOperatingIncome.description: Amount of revenue earned, classified as other, excluding interest income.

NonoperatingGainsLosses.label: Nonoperating Gains (Losses)
NonoperatingGainsLosses.description: The aggregate amount of gains or losses resulting from nonoperating activities (for example, interest and dividend revenue, property, plant and equipment impairment loss, and so forth).

NonoperatingIncomeExpense.label: Nonoperating Income (Expense)
NonoperatingIncomeExpense.description: The aggregate amount of income or expense from ancillary business-related activities (that is to say, excluding major activities considered part of the normal operations of the business).

NotesReceivableRelatedParties.label: Notes Receivable, Related Parties
NotesReceivableRelatedParties.description: For an unclassified balance sheet, amounts due from parties associated with the reporting entity as evidenced by a written promise to pay.

NumberOfReportableSegments.label: Number of Reportable Segments
NumberOfReportableSegments.description: Number of segments reported by the entity. A reportable segment is a component of an entity for which there is an accounting requirement to report separate financial information on that component in the entity's financial statements.

NumberOfReportingUnits.label: Number of Reporting Units
NumberOfReportingUnits.description: Number of reporting units tested for impairment of goodwill. A reporting unit is an operating segment or one level below an operating segment.

OccupancyNet.label: Occupancy, Net
OccupancyNet.description: Amount of net occupancy expense that may include items, such as depreciation of facilities and equipment, lease expenses, property taxes and property and casualty insurance expense.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDue.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments Due
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDue.description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable letter-terms in excess of one year.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueC.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments Due, Next Twelve Months
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueC.description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the next fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Due in Five Years
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the fifth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Due in Four Years
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the fourth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Due in Three Years
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the third fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Due in Two Years
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the second fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueT.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Due Thereafter
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueT.description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due after the fifth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

OperatingLossCarryforwards.label: Operating Loss Carryforwards
OperatingLossCarryforwards.description: Amount of operating loss carryforward, before tax effects, available to reduce future taxable income under enacted tax laws.

OtherAccruedLiabilitiesCurrentAndNoncurr.label: Other Accrued Liabilities
OtherAccruedLiabilitiesCurrentAndNoncurr.description: Amount of expenses incurred but not yet paid classified as other.

OtherAssets.label: Other Assets
OtherAssets.description: Amount of assets classified as other.

OtherAssetsFairValueDisclosure.label: Other Assets, Fair Value Disclosure
OtherAssetsFairValueDisclosure.description: Fair value portion of other assets.

OtherCommitment.label: Other Commitment
OtherCommitment.description: Minimum amount of other commitment not otherwise specified in the taxonomy. Excludes commitments explicitly modeled in the taxonomy, including but not limited to, long-term and short-term purchase commitments, recorded and unrecorded purchase obligations, supply commitments, registration payment arrangements, leases, debt, product warranties, guarantees, environmental remediation obligations, and pensions.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossAvailableFor.label: OCI, Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Gain (Loss), after Adjustment, before Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossAvailableFor.description: Amount, before tax and after adjustment, of unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) and unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) from transfer to available-for-sale.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossBeforeTax.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), before Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossBeforeTax.description: Amount before tax, after reclassification adjustments of other comprehensive income (loss).

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfTax.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfTax.description: Amount after tax and reclassification adjustments of other comprehensive income (loss).

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfTaxPeri.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfTaxPeri.description: This element represents Other Comprehensive Income or Loss, Net of Tax, for the period. Includes deferred gains or losses on qualifying hedges, unrealized holding gains or losses on available-for-sale securities, minimum pension liability, and cumulative translation adjustment. While for technical reasons this element has no balance attribute, the default assumption is a credit balance consistent with its label.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassifica.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Reclassification Adjustment from AOCI on Derivatives, before Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassifica.description: Amount before tax of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income of accumulated gain (loss) realized from derivative instruments designated and qualifying as the effective portion of cash flow hedges and an entity's share of an equity investee's deferred hedging gain (loss).

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassifica.label: Other Comprehensive (Income) Loss, Defined Benefit Plan, Reclassification Adjustment from AOCI, before Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassifica.description: Amount before tax of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive (income) loss related to net period benefit cost (credit) for pension and other postretirement defined benefit plans.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassifica.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Defined Benefit Plan, Transition Asset (Obligation), Reclassification Adjustment from AOCI, before Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassifica.description: Amount, before tax, of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income (loss) for transition asset (obligation) of defined benefit plan.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassifica.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Reclassification Adjustment on Derivatives Included in Net Income, Tax (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassifica.description: Tax effect of the income statement impact of the reclassification adjustment of accumulated gain (loss) from derivative instruments designated and qualifying as the effective portion of cash flow hedges realized in net income. Also includes reclassification adjustments of an entity's share of an equity investee's deferred hedging gain (loss) realized in net income.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossTax.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossTax.description: Amount of tax expense (benefit) allocated to other comprehensive income (loss).

OtherComprehensiveIncomeReclassification.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Reclassification Adjustment on Derivatives Included in Net Income, Net of Tax (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
OtherComprehensiveIncomeReclassification.description: Net of tax effect of the reclassification adjustment for accumulated gains and losses from derivative instrument designated and qualifying as the effective portion of cash flow hedges included in accumulated comprehensive income that was realized in net income during the period.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeReclassification.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Reclassification Adjustment on Derivatives Included in Net Income, Tax (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
OtherComprehensiveIncomeReclassification.description: Tax effect on reclassification adjustment for accumulated gains and losses from derivative instrument designated and qualifying as the effective portion of cash flow hedges included in accumulated comprehensive income that was realized in net income during the period.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeReclassification.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Reclassification, Pension and Other Postretirement Benefit Plans, Net Transition Asset (Obligation), Recognized in Net Periodic Benefit Cost, before Tax (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
OtherComprehensiveIncomeReclassification.description: Before tax amount of the income statement impact of the reclassification adjustment for the net transition asset (obligation) recognized as a component of net periodic benefit cost.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeReclassification.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Reclassification, Pension and Other Postretirement Benefit Plans, Net Transition Asset (Obligation), Recognized in Net Periodic Benefit Cost, Net of Tax (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
OtherComprehensiveIncomeReclassification.description: Net of tax amount of the income statement impact of the reclassification adjustment for the net transition (asset) obligation recognized as a component of net periodic benefit cost.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeReclassification.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Reclassification, Pension and Other Postretirement Benefit Plans, Net Transition Asset (Obligation), Recognized in Net Periodic Benefit Cost, Tax (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
OtherComprehensiveIncomeReclassification.description: For each annual statement of income presented, the tax effect of the net transition asset or obligation recognized as a reclassification adjustment of other comprehensive income as a result of being recognized as a component of net periodic benefit cost for the period.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedHoldin.label: OCI, Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Unrealized Holding Gain (Loss), before Adjustment, after Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedHoldin.description: Amount, after tax and before adjustment, of unrealized holding gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale). Excludes unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) from transfer to available-for-sale.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedHoldin.label: OCI, Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Unrealized Holding Gain (Loss), before Adjustment, Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedHoldin.description: Amount, before adjustment, of tax expense (benefit) for unrealized holding gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale). Excludes tax expense (benefit) for unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) from transfer to available-for-sale.

OtherCostAndExpenseOperating.label: Other Cost and Expense, Operating
OtherCostAndExpenseOperating.description: The total amount of other operating cost and expense items that are associated with the entity's normal revenue producing operation.

OtherDepreciationAndAmortization.label: Other Depreciation and Amortization
OtherDepreciationAndAmortization.description: Amount of expense charged against earnings to allocate the cost of tangible and intangible assets over their remaining economic lives, classified as other.

OtherExpenses.label: Other Expenses
OtherExpenses.description: Amount of expense classified as other.

OtherGeneralExpense.label: Other General Expense
OtherGeneralExpense.description: Amount of general expenses not normally included in Other Operating Costs and Expenses.

OtherLiabilities.label: Other Liabilities
OtherLiabilities.description: Amount of liabilities classified as other.

OtherNoncashIncomeExpense.label: Other Noncash Income (Expense)
OtherNoncashIncomeExpense.description: Amount of income (expense) included in net income that results in no cash inflow (outflow), classified as other.

OtherNoninterestExpense.label: Other Noninterest Expense
OtherNoninterestExpense.description: Amount of noninterest expense classified as other.

OtherNonoperatingGainsLosses.label: Other Nonoperating Gains (Losses)
OtherNonoperatingGainsLosses.description: Amount of gain (loss) related to nonoperating activities, classified as other.

OtherNonoperatingIncomeExpense.label: Other Nonoperating Income (Expense)
OtherNonoperatingIncomeExpense.description: Amount of income (expense) related to nonoperating activities, classified as other.

OtherOperatingActivitiesCashFlowStatemen.label: Other Operating Activities, Cash Flow Statement
OtherOperatingActivitiesCashFlowStatemen.description: Other cash or noncash adjustments to reconcile net income to cash provided by (used in) operating activities that are not separately disclosed in the statement of cash flows (for example, cash received or cash paid during the current period for miscellaneous operating activities, net change during the reporting period in other assets or other liabilities).

OtherOperatingIncome.label: Other Operating Income
OtherOperatingIncome.description: The total amount of other operating income, the components of which are not separately disclosed on the income statement, from items that are associated with the entity's normal revenue producing operation.

OtherOperatingIncomeExpenseNet.label: Other Operating Income (Expense), Net
OtherOperatingIncomeExpenseNet.description: The net amount of other operating income and expenses, the components of which are not separately disclosed on the income statement, from items that are associated with the entity's normal revenue producing operations.

OtherPaymentsToAcquireBusinesses.label: Other Payments to Acquire Businesses
OtherPaymentsToAcquireBusinesses.description: The cash outflow associated with other payments to acquire businesses including deposit on pending acquisitions and preacquisition costs.

OtherReceivables.label: Other Receivables
OtherReceivables.description: Amount due from parties in nontrade transactions, classified as other.

OtherShortTermBorrowings.label: Other Short-term Borrowings
OtherShortTermBorrowings.description: Amount of borrowings classified as other, maturing within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

OtherTaxExpenseBenefit.label: Other Tax Expense (Benefit)
OtherTaxExpenseBenefit.description: Amount of other income tax expense (benefit).

ParticipatingSecuritiesDistributedAndUnd.label: Participating Securities, Distributed and Undistributed Earnings (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
ParticipatingSecuritiesDistributedAndUnd.description: Aggregate of earnings distributed and earnings allocated to participating securities under the two-class method to the extent that participating securities may share in earnings as if all of the earnings for the period had been distributed.

ParticipatingSecuritiesDistributedAndUnd.label: Participating Securities, Distributed and Undistributed Earnings (Loss), Basic
ParticipatingSecuritiesDistributedAndUnd.description: Amount of earnings (loss) distributed and earnings (loss) allocated to participating securities for the basic earnings (loss) per share or per unit calculation under the two-class method.

ParticipatingSecuritiesDistributedAndUnd.label: Participating Securities, Distributed and Undistributed Earnings (Loss), Diluted
ParticipatingSecuritiesDistributedAndUnd.description: Amount of earnings (loss) distributed and earnings (loss) allocated to participating securities for the diluted earnings (loss) per share or per unit calculation under the two-class method.

PaymentsForOriginationAndPurchasesOfLoan.label: Payments for Origination and Purchases of Loans Held-for-sale
PaymentsForOriginationAndPurchasesOfLoan.description: The aggregate amount of cash outflow for loans purchased and created with the intention to resell them in the near future.

PaymentsForProceedsFromOtherInvestingAct.label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Other Investing Activities
PaymentsForProceedsFromOtherInvestingAct.description: Amount of cash (inflow) outflow from investing activities classified as other.

PaymentsForRepurchaseOfCommonStock.label: Payments for Repurchase of Common Stock
PaymentsForRepurchaseOfCommonStock.description: The cash outflow to reacquire common stock during the period.

PaymentsForRestructuring.label: Payments for Restructuring
PaymentsForRestructuring.description: Amount of cash payments made as the result of exit or disposal activities. Excludes payments associated with a discontinued operation or an asset retirement obligation.

PaymentsOfCapitalDistribution.label: Payments of Capital Distribution
PaymentsOfCapitalDistribution.description: Cash outflow to owners or shareholders, excluding ordinary dividends. Includes special dividends.

PaymentsOfDebtExtinguishmentCosts.label: Payment for Debt Extinguishment or Debt Prepayment Cost
PaymentsOfDebtExtinguishmentCosts.description: Amount of cash outflow for cost from early extinguishment and prepayment of debt. Includes, but is not limited to, third-party cost, premium paid, and other fee paid to lender directly for debt extinguishment or debt prepayment. Excludes accrued interest.

PaymentsOfDebtIssuanceCosts.label: Payments of Debt Issuance Costs
PaymentsOfDebtIssuanceCosts.description: The cash outflow paid to third parties in connection with debt origination, which will be amortized over the remaining maturity period of the associated long-term debt.

PaymentsOfDividends.label: Payments of Dividends
PaymentsOfDividends.description: Cash outflow in the form of capital distributions and dividends to common shareholders, preferred shareholders and noncontrolling interests.

PaymentsRelatedToTaxWithholdingForShareB.label: Payment, Tax Withholding, Share-based Payment Arrangement
PaymentsRelatedToTaxWithholdingForShareB.description: Amount of cash outflow to satisfy grantee's tax withholding obligation for award under share-based payment arrangement.

PaymentsToAcquireAssetsInvestingActiviti.label: Payments to Acquire Assets, Investing Activities
PaymentsToAcquireAssetsInvestingActiviti.description: Aggregate cash payments for a combination of transactions that are classified as investing activities in which assets, which may include securities, other types of investments, or productive assets, are purchased from third-party sellers. This element can be used by entities to aggregate payments for all asset purchases that are classified as investing activities.

PaymentsToAcquireBusinessesNetOfCashAcqu.label: Payments to Acquire Businesses, Net of Cash Acquired
PaymentsToAcquireBusinessesNetOfCashAcqu.description: The cash outflow associated with the acquisition of a business, net of the cash acquired from the purchase.

PaymentsToAcquireBusinessTwoNetOfCashAcq.label: Payments to Acquire Business Two, Net of Cash Acquired
PaymentsToAcquireBusinessTwoNetOfCashAcq.description: The cash outflow associated with a second acquisition of a business, net of the cash acquired from the purchase.

PaymentsToAcquireLoansAndLeasesHeldForIn.label: Payments to Acquire Loans and Leases Held-for-investment
PaymentsToAcquireLoansAndLeasesHeldForIn.description: The cash outflow from (a) purchases of loans held-for-investment, (b) purchases of leases held-for-investment, and (c) both.

PaymentsToAcquireLoansHeldForInvestment.label: Payments to Acquire Loans Held-for-investment
PaymentsToAcquireLoansHeldForInvestment.description: The cash outflow associated with purchasing loans held for investment purposes during the period.

PaymentsToAcquireMortgageServicingRights.label: Payments to Acquire Mortgage Servicing Rights (MSR)
PaymentsToAcquireMortgageServicingRights.description: The cash outflow to obtain servicing rights, which contractually entitle the servicer to receive fees and ancillary revenues for performing billing, collection, disbursement and recordkeeping services in connection with a mortgage portfolio. Rights may be obtained via (1) acquisition or assumption of a servicing obligation that does not relate to financial assets of the servicer or its consolidated affiliates; or (2) by originating mortgage loans and then (a) transferring the loans to a Variable Interest Entity (VIE) in a transaction that meets the necessary transfer and classification requirements, or (b) transferring the loans in a transaction that meets the requirements for sale accounting.

PaymentsToAcquirePropertyPlantAndEquipme.label: Payments to Acquire Property, Plant, and Equipment
PaymentsToAcquirePropertyPlantAndEquipme.description: The cash outflow associated with the acquisition of long-lived, physical assets that are used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services and not intended for resale; includes cash outflows to pay for construction of self-constructed assets.

PerformanceFees.label: Performance Fees (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
PerformanceFees.description: Amount of revenue earned by the entity based on the investment results achieved. Excludes fees based upon a percentage of the assets under management not performance-related.

PolicyholderBenefitsAndClaimsIncurredNet.label: Policyholder Benefits and Claims Incurred, Net
PolicyholderBenefitsAndClaimsIncurredNet.description: Amount, after effects of policies assumed or ceded, of expense related to the provision for policy benefits and costs incurred.

PostconfirmationAccountsPayable.label: Postconfirmation, Accounts Payable
PostconfirmationAccountsPayable.description: Amount of accounts payable at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

PostconfirmationAccumulatedOtherComprehe.label: Postconfirmation, Accumulated Other Comprehensive Income (Loss)
PostconfirmationAccumulatedOtherComprehe.description: Amount of accumulated other comprehensive Income or Loss at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

PostconfirmationAdditionalPaidInCapital.label: Postconfirmation, Additional Paid-in Capital
PostconfirmationAdditionalPaidInCapital.description: Amount of additional paid-in capital at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

PostconfirmationAmortizableIntangibleAss.label: Postconfirmation, Amortizable Intangible Assets
PostconfirmationAmortizableIntangibleAss.description: Amount of amortizable intangible assets at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

PostconfirmationAssets.label: Postconfirmation, Assets
PostconfirmationAssets.description: Total assets at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

PostconfirmationCashAndCashEquivalents.label: Postconfirmation, Cash and Cash Equivalents
PostconfirmationCashAndCashEquivalents.description: Amount of cash and cash equivalents at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

PostconfirmationCommonStock.label: Postconfirmation, Common Stock
PostconfirmationCommonStock.description: Amount of common stock at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

PostconfirmationDeferredIncomeTaxAssetsN.label: Postconfirmation, Deferred Income Tax Assets, Noncurrent
PostconfirmationDeferredIncomeTaxAssetsN.description: Amount of noncurrent deferred income tax assets at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

PostconfirmationDeferredIncomeTaxLiabili.label: Postconfirmation, Deferred Income Tax Liabilities, Noncurrent
PostconfirmationDeferredIncomeTaxLiabili.description: Amount of noncurrent deferred tax liabilities at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

PostconfirmationGoodwill.label: Postconfirmation, Goodwill
PostconfirmationGoodwill.description: Amount of goodwill at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

PostconfirmationLiabilities.label: Postconfirmation, Liabilities
PostconfirmationLiabilities.description: Total liabilities at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

PostconfirmationLiabilitiesAndStockholde.label: Postconfirmation, Liabilities and Stockholders' Equity
PostconfirmationLiabilitiesAndStockholde.description: Total liabilities and stockholders' equity at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

PostconfirmationLiabilitiesSubjectToComp.label: Postconfirmation, Liabilities Subject to Compromise
PostconfirmationLiabilitiesSubjectToComp.description: Amount of liabilities subject to compromise at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

PostconfirmationLongTermDebt.label: Postconfirmation, Long-term Debt
PostconfirmationLongTermDebt.description: Total long-term debt at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

PostconfirmationOtherAssetsNoncurrent.label: Postconfirmation, Other Assets, Noncurrent
PostconfirmationOtherAssetsNoncurrent.description: Amount of other noncurrent assets at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

PostconfirmationPostconfirmationCreditFa.label: Postconfirmation, Postconfirmation Credit Facility
PostconfirmationPostconfirmationCreditFa.description: Amount of long-term postconfirmation date credit facility at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

PostconfirmationPreferredStock.label: Postconfirmation, Preferred Stock
PostconfirmationPreferredStock.description: Amount of preferred stock at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

PostconfirmationPropertyAndEquipmentNet.label: Postconfirmation, Property and Equipment, Net
PostconfirmationPropertyAndEquipmentNet.description: Total property and equipment, net at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

PostconfirmationReceivablesNet.label: Postconfirmation, Receivables, Net
PostconfirmationReceivablesNet.description: Amount of receivables, net at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

PostconfirmationRestrictedCashAndCashEqu.label: Postconfirmation, Restricted Cash and Cash Equivalents, Current
PostconfirmationRestrictedCashAndCashEqu.description: Amount of current restricted cash and cash equivalents at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

PostconfirmationRetainedEarningsDeficit.label: Postconfirmation, Retained Earnings (Deficit)
PostconfirmationRetainedEarningsDeficit.description: Amount of retained earnings or deficit at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

PostconfirmationStockholdersEquity.label: Postconfirmation, Stockholders' Equity
PostconfirmationStockholdersEquity.description: Total stockholders' equity at the balance sheet date after fresh-start adjustments.

PreconfirmationAccountsPayable.label: Preconfirmation, Accounts Payable
PreconfirmationAccountsPayable.description: Amount of accounts payable at the balance sheet date before fresh-start adjustments.
